caption: Relating to procedures and grounds related to the removal and placement of children, including for terminating the parent-child relationship, for taking possession of a child, and for certain hearings in a suit affecting the parent-child relationship involving the Department of Family and Protective Services.
summary: This bill modifies procedures for child removal and placement by the Department of Family and Protective Services (DFPS). It requires "active efforts" instead of just "reasonable efforts" to keep families together, raises the evidence standard to "beyond reasonable doubt" for terminating parental rights, and establishes a strict placement preference order prioritizing relatives and those with existing relationships. While not specifically targeting Chinese immigrants, these heightened standards would apply to all families, including Chinese families, in child welfare cases.
translation: 该法案修改了家庭和保护服务部(DFPS)关于儿童移除和安置的程序。它要求采取"积极努力"而不仅仅是"合理努力"来维系家庭团聚，将终止父母权利的证据标准提高到"排除合理怀疑"，并建立了严格的安置优先顺序，优先考虑亲属和已有关系的人。虽然没有特别针对中国移民，但这些更高的标准将适用于儿童福利案件中的所有家庭，包括中国家庭。
committees:
